item.description:
Monthly Meet Up!

The Skellig
240 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 647-0679


Hi Everybody!
Skelligs seems to be a perfect place for a casual meetup place. The October meetup was very relaxed and friendly, and we had several new members. The food and drinks are affordable and there's plenty of room for us. We had such a nice time and everyone went home with a full belly and new friends. Eventually I'd like to alternate monthly Tues and Thurs (to accomodate those with custody days) but for now, I only have Thursday nights off. Looking forward to seeing you there!

debbie

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group
